imdb.title: Senran Kagura
imdb.plot: 5 girls with abnormally sized breasts try to battle another group of girls who hate them for, reasons.

episodes.title: Heart-pounding Body Measurement
episodes.plot: Katsuragi gets playful with Asuka whilst performing body measurements.

episodes.title: Protect Hibari's Naked Body!
episodes.plot: Yagyuu goes to extreme lengths to try and prevent Hibari's naked body from being exposed.

episodes.title: I Want to Put my Face in your Chest!
episodes.plot: Wanting inspiration for her poems, Ikaruga curiously requests to stick her face in Katsuragi's chest.

episodes.title: Ikaruga Style Exercise
episodes.plot: Noticing Hibari and Yagyuu looking a little chubby, Ikaruga puts them through an exercise regime.

episodes.title: Forbidden! The Sealed Fear!
episodes.plot: Asuka and Ikaruga come across a sealed gym storage area which turns out to contain some very special training devices.

episodes.title: A Rival Showdown Without Humanity or Justice!
episodes.plot: At last, the final battle between Asuka and Homura - which takes a very strange turn on Hanzo's insistence.

episodes.title: Ninja That Stand Atop Skyscrapers
episodes.plot: A young shinobi named Asuka carries out a daring mission. The following day, she returns to Hanzo Academy in Asakusa, Tokyo, where she secretly trains with four other classmates. Their afternoon field work holds an unexpected surprise in store for them.

episodes.title: The Legendary Shinobi Appears
episodes.plot: Asuka and the others continue training, but are fobbidden from any contact with those outside the school. Asuka feels disappointed when everyone but herself is able to perform the ninja animal-summoning technique. Asuka's Grandpa Hanzo visits the school.

episodes.title: Moonlight Intruder
episodes.plot: Ikaruga and Asuka are confronted by an overpowering Yomi outside the supermarket. Following the confrontation, Ikaruga is left with doubts about her abilities. Meanwhile, Ikaruga's adpoted brother turns up missing. Asuka faces her fear of frogs.

episodes.title: Seaside Training - Shinobi Island
episodes.plot: The class members travel to Shinobi Island, a training ground used by shinobi for centuries. Upon their arrival, they are tasked with cleaning the boarding house, where Hibari discovers the written aspiration of a past student to become a "Super-ninja."

episodes.title: Sneak Attack! Hanzo Academy
episodes.plot: The Hanzo girls train even harder to be ready for the Hebijo shinobi's next move. The Hebijo girls sneak onto campus to locate the Hanzo girls' training facility. Upon finding the old schoolhouse, it is placed in a kekkai, trapping the Hanzo girls inside!

episodes.title: Interlocking Shinobi Kekkai Barriers
episodes.plot: The Hanzo shinobi continue to fight one-on-one against the Hebijo shinobi. When Yagyu manages to defeat her opponent and free herself from her pocket of kekkai space, she attempts to enter Hibari's pocket to protect her, at great physical risk to herself.

episodes.title: Hiking Terror
episodes.plot: Still reeling from the blow they were dealt by Hebijo, Kiriya decides to ramp up the girls' training with a mountain-climbing training excursion. This so-called "Hai-kin-gu" training provides many challenges to the Hanzo team, both together and separately.

episodes.title: A Shinobi Classroom Retrospective
episodes.plot: Kiriya's training of the girls turns especially strict. Afterward, he reminisces about the time two years earlier when Ikaruga and Katsuragi were new students. As Asuka, Hibari, and Yagyu join in later on, the road to the team's formation is revealed.

episodes.title: Hebijo Clandestine Girls' Academy
episodes.plot: Under Haruka's control, Hibari breaks into Hanzo Academy's depository and takes the super-secret ninja art scroll. After Haruka leaves with the scroll, Hibari feels that she has betrayed the others, and runs away from the academy to get the scroll back.

episodes.title: Yin and Yang
episodes.plot: With the map from Suzune, the Hanzo Academy shinobi prepare to attack the Hebijo base. As Hibari learns more about Hebijo's training methods, she is determined to take back the secret scroll. Suzune gets in hot water for luring the Hanzo shinobi to Hebijo.

episodes.title: Castle Showdown
episodes.plot: Yomi waits in ambush to keep the Hanzo shinobi from moving forward. As Ikaruga takes matters into her own hands, Hibari is desperate to escape her cell and tell the others not to fight the Hebijo students, as it will mean their deaths if they lose.

episodes.title: Super-Secret Ninja Art
episodes.plot: Fierce battles continue to be waged as the Hanzo Academy shinobi try to reach the castle's top floor. Meanwhile, outside, Kiriya, Daidoji, and Suzune have a confrontation of their own. With everything at stake, Asuka and Homura engage in one last showdown.
